channel.title: [VFM] Cursed Images JOAT9 - D5 - Town win!
channel.description:
Cursed Image Mafia
*Small setup hosted by Geyde*
### Rules
- Don't be toxic - Don't use out of game info as an argument to determine people’s argument. If you have reason to know someone’s alignment based on OOG info, please contact me and I will act accordingly. - Don't post in the thread at night or after hammer - Try to stay in the spirit of the game
Rulebreaks will be handled by force-replacing the offendors in question. Don't be afraid to note rulebreaks to me.
### Mechanics
Rolelist:
> [color=green]**Town JOAT**[/color] > [color=green]**Vanilla Town**[/color] x6 > [color=red]**Mafia Goon**[/color] x2
[details="Example Rolecards"]
> # [color=green]Gorefield[/color] > [image] > **Town JOAT** > > You have multiple night abilities with one use each. > > **Watcher** - Learn who visits the target player during the night. > > **Jailkeeper** - Roleblock a player. They will also be protected from night kills. > > **Cop** - Learn if the target is Mafia. > > Example results: > *Watcher* > > [Player] was visited by [Player2] > > [Player] was not visited by anyone > > *Cop* > > [Player] is Mafia > > [Player] is not Mafia > > *Defeat the Mafia*
> # [color=green]Giornhole[/color] > [image] > **Vanilla Town** > > You have no special abilities of your own, but can vote and talk freely. > > *Defeat the Mafia*
> # [color=red]Movie Sonic[/color] > [image] > **Mafia Goon** > > Your partner is [x]. You may talk to them during the night. > You have access to the factional kill action, which will be decided between you and your partner. > > *Defeat the Town*
[/details]
- 48/24 phases - Lynching is Majority and Plurality. - Mafia chat is during day/night. The chat will be on the forums.
### Lads (/join)
1. [color=red]**DatBird**[/color] - [color=green]**Town JOAT**[/color] 2. [color=red]**Luxy**[/color] - [color=green]**Vanilla Town**[/color] 3. [color=red]**Mercenary**[/color] - [color=brown]**Mafia Goon**[/color] 4. [color=red]**Arete**[/color] - [color=green]**Vanilla Town**[/color] 5. [color=red]**SetToBlow**[/color] - [color=green]**Vanilla Town**[/color] 6. James 7. Monokuma 8. [color=red]**Red_Sea**[/color] - [color=green]**Vanilla Town**[/color] 9. H_Hja
### Backup (/backup)
1. 2.
### Spectator (/spec)
1. 2.
## Thread Summary
[Mercenary is Lynched!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/vfm-cursed-images-joat9-n1-8-9/78609/898) [DatBird was Killed!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/vfm-cursed-images-joat9-n1-8-9/78609/900)

item.title: [VFM] Cursed Images JOAT9 - D5 - Town win!
item.dc:creator: Vulgard
item.description:
I knew it

I figured out it had to be Alice when there was no nightkill. I figured nobody in this playerlist who was still alive would make a play like that except for Alice, because it made sense only for her (she had towncred and authority so she could potentially convince town to lynch someone in MyLo).

Still a really fun game to watch, too bad the activity was low. WP Hja. A for Effort (A for Alice) to the scumteam.

Read full topic
item.source: [VFM] Cursed Images JOAT9 - D5 - Town win!
